seed_pair.target: Eso es muy amable de tu parte y estoy agradecido a ti por ayudar.
seed_pair.known: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.

S0132: Eso es menos emocionante que lo que decía.
That's less exciting than what she was saying.
S0133: Llegas a conocer muy bien a alguien cuando trabajan juntos.
You get to know someone very well when you work together.
S0134: No es un problema cuando trabajas en algo difícil con ellos.
It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.
S0135: No sé por qué piensas que es tan bueno.
I don't know why you think that it's so good.
S0136: Por supuesto que puedes preguntarle porque es mi amiga.
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
S0137: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente que ser perfecto.
It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.
S0138: Esto era donde mi amigo quería reunirse con nosotros.
This was where my friend wanted to meet us.
S0139: Lo siento que necesito irme tan temprano.
I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.
S0140: Lo siento que no puedo ver lo que estás intentando mostrarme.
I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.
S0141: No hay problema. Todo está bien.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
